runs.comm: excellent delivery to start with, pitches just short of a length outside off stump, Nazir tries to drive on the up but gets beaten
cut off the back foot towards Clarke at point
full delivery on leg stump, Nazir tries to flick but gets beaten for pace and is struck on the pad, the batsmen run a leg bye behind square leg
too full outside the off stump, Hafeez moves forward and drives firmly past Symonds at cover for the first boundary of the innings
short of a length on off stump, Hafeez moves back and defends towards cover point
full delivery on off stump, Hafeez once again drives towards Symonds at cover but the bat turns in his hand and he doesn't time it well
good length delivery outside off stump, the ball seams back into Nazir who waits on the back foot and plays a superb cut for four, he had no room to work with but placed it well
played off the pads towards midwicket
Nazir charges down the track and has a wild heave at the ball, Bracken bowls a slower one and beats Nazir
just a fraction short on leg stump, Nazir moves across his stumps in a trice and plays a short-arm pull over backward square leg, that sailed over the boundary
Nazir tries to run the ball towards third man but gets cramped for room and is beaten outside the off stump
Bracken finishes the over with a superb yorker on leg stump, Nazir gets an inside edge on to the pad
pitches on a good length outside off stump and holds its line, Hafeez gets caught on the crease, pokes at it and gets beaten outside off stump
slow full toss on middle stump, pushed towards midwicket
Lee bowls a quick delivery on middle and leg stump, Hafeez tries to work the ball off his pads but misses, Hafeez sets off for a leg bye but gets sent back by Nazir
Lee drops it short on middle and leg stump, Hafeez moves back, gets into position early and pulls the ball flat over the backward square leg boundary
Lee bowls a full ball outside leg stump, Hafeez comes down the track and makes room to hit down the ground but gets beaten
Lee over pitches on middle stump, Hafeez eases on to the front foot and lofts the ball straight past the bowler for four more, ten runs off that over

he strikes with his first ball! Nazir steps down the track and throws his bat at a delivery outside off stump, he was aiming to hit that down the ground but the top edge swirls high in the air towards Johnson at mid-on who takes a well judged catch, that went miles in the air
played with an open face down to third man
Butt's off the mark with a flick off the hips behind square leg

caught at point! Hafeez tries to cut a slower one outside off stump, he hits it in the air towards Clarke who dives to his right at point and pulls off a sharp catch, Pakistan have lost both their openers
Younis tries to run one down to third man but gets beaten by a slower ball
Clark strays on to leg stump, poor line when you have fine leg in the circle, Younis moves towards the off side and glances the ball off his hips to the long-leg boundary
starts off with a full ball on off and middle stump, Butt defends on the front foot
pushed off the back foot through cover point
this one bounces sharply from a good length and beats Butt who tries to cut off the back foot
defended off the back foot to Hayden at cover point
Johnson bowls a slow yorker on middle stump, Butt pushes it towards mid-on
Johnson bangs in a fiery bouncer but it bounces too high over the batsman, it's called wide
this time Johnson pitches outside off stump and seams further away from the left-hander, another wide
excellent ball, pitches on a good length outside off stump and seams away from Butt who fends at it off the back foot and gets beaten
caught! Younis Khan tries to pull a ball that's not short at all and ends up lobbing an easy catch to Brett Lee at mid-on, Clark has his third wicket
short of a length outside off stump, Malik waits on the back foot and tries to defend but gets beaten
short and wide outside off stump, Malik moves back and cuts to Clarke at point, Malik sets off for a single which could have proved risky had Clarke hit at the non-striker's end
defended off the back foot towards cover point
lovely shot, Butt moves on to the front foot and drives elegantly through cover for four
Clark ends the over with a slower ball, Butt tries to cut off the back foot but gets beaten
pitches on a good length on middle stump, played with an open face towards backward point
full and wide outside off stump, Malik frees his arms and lofts over cover, Hodge field on the cover boundary
Johnson's slower ball strays down leg side, that's another wide
over-pitched outside the off stump and Butt cashes it with a classical cover drive that races over this fast outfield for another boundary
lbw! Johnson bowls it full and straight, angling into the left-hander, Butt comes half forward and moves across his stumps, the ball hits him on the pad in front of middle, that's pretty plumb
Johnson bowls wide outside off stump, Misbah lets it go
he strays down leg side and concedes another wide
short of a length on middle stump, Misbah fends the ball towards square leg for  a single
bowled slowly through the air on off stump, driven off the front foot to long off
full toss on middle stump, pulled to deep midwicket
defended back to Symonds on the front foot
driven towards long off for a single
Malik waits on the back foot and lofts a full ball over midwicket, Lee runs to his right on the long-on boundary but can't save it
driven towards midwicket off the back foot
short and wide outside off stump, Malik gets on to the front foot and lofts on the up over cover for four, that was hit with a lot of power
played with an open face towards backward point
slightly slower from Johnson on off stump, Malik gets forward and drives to long-off
good length delivery on off stump, Misbah moves back and across and defends to the off side
once again he moves towards the off side and gets an inside edge behind square on the leg side, there's a large vacant region there and the batsmen run two
played towards backward point with an open face
shot! Clark over pitches on middle stump, Malik moves forward, eyes the long-on region because the fielder is in the circle and lofts cleanly over the boundary
cut off the back foot to short third man
Clark bowls a short ball on middle and leg, Misbah moves towards the off side and paddles the ball towards Johnson at fine leg
slower ball on off and middle stump, defended on the front foot towards the off side
another slower ball on off stump, Misbah opens the face of the bat and guides the ball to Hayden at backward point, he shies at the bowler's end and concedes an overthrow
pushed off the pads towards midwicket
defended off the front foot back to the bowler
full ball on off stump, driven past the bowler off the front foot for a single
good length ball pitches on leg and angles across the right-hander, driven off the back foot to Bracken
driven hard once again straight past the bowler, the ball hits the stumps at the non-striker's end
excellent line and length from Bracken around the off stump, defended towards cover on the front foot
full delivery driven to long-on for a single
full toss on off stump, pulled behind square leg for a single, Malik missed out there
played off the pads towards midwicket
Malik steps down the pitch and hammers the ball straight past Clarke, he's hit that so hard that long-off has no chance
superb use of the feet, Malik backs away to make room and lofts inside out over extra cover, he's timed that well enough  to clear the boundary
and again! Malik uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball and lofts back over Clarke's head for four more
driven off the front foot to long-on, these two have already added 50 runs
flicked off the pads through midwicket for a single
Misbah moves across his stumps and tries to work it behind square, Bracken follows him and Misbah is forced to defend
driven off the front foot towards mid-off
awesome shot! Misbah backs away towards leg, giving Bracken view of all three stumps, Bracken bowls a full ball on middle stump and Misbah lofts it cleanly over cover for four
Misbah opens the face to run the ball fine past Gilchrist for another boundary
he moves across his stumps and chips a full ball down to fine leg, ten runs off the over
short and wide outside off stump, Misbah cuts off the back foot to Hogg who has to slide on the point boundary to save four
played off the back foot with an open face past point
Misbah moves across his stumps and pushes the ball towards midwicket for a single
short outside the off stump once again from Lee, Malik waits on the back foot and cuts to third man
poor line, Lee strays down leg side, Misbah moves towards the off and guides the ball past short fine leg for four
cut off the back foot to third man for a single, Pakistan are keeping up with the asking rate
Misbah pulls out the reverse sweep and sends a full toss racing through point for four
excellent placement and timing, Misbah moves back and cuts past point for four more
played through midwicket for two more, ten runs off the first three balls of the over
too short from Symonds, Misbah gets on to the back foot and pulls into the gap at deep midwicket, Lee can't run across quickly enough to save the boundary, top shot
cut off the back foot through point for  a single
driven off the front foot through midwicket once again, he's placed that nicely in the gap between deep midwicket and long-on
short ball outside off stump, pulled through square leg for  a single
the slower ball on middle stump, defended on the front foot towards cover
another slower ball, it's a full toss which Malik drives to long-on for a single
Clark bowls a full ball on leg stump, flicked behind square for a single
yet another slower ball from Clark, it pitches outside off and seams away from Malik who tries to loft down the ground and gets beaten
in the blockhole on middle stump, pushed off the pads to midwicket for a single
Lee fires in the yorker on middle stump, Malik defends towards mid-on
another yorker length delivery on middle stump, Malik gets an inside edge down to long leg where Hogg does well to keep the batsmen to a single
slower ball on off stump, Misbah defends back to Lee off the front foot
full toss on off stump, Lee was looking for the yorker, Misbah drives to long-on to bring up his fifty, well played but there's a bit more to do
full toss on off stump, Malik drives back to Lee who picks up and fires the throw back at Malik and hits him on the calf, the ball rolls to Bracken at short fine leg
Lee over-steps and bowls a full toss which Malik hits towards mid-on, Clarke dives to his left and fields superbly but concedes an overthrow, free hit coming up
Lee bowls a slower ball outside off stump, Malik tries to heave it through the leg side but can't make contact, the free hit doesn't cost Australia
played off the pads through midwicket for two more
superb shot, Misbah picks up the slower ball and lofts it crisply over Johnson's head, the ball splits long-off and long-on and reaches the boundary
driven off the front foot through point
full ball outside the off stump, Malik chips it in the air towards long-off for two more runs, just 13 needed off 14 now
driven uppishly off the front foot to Symonds at cover
good length ball on middle stump, Malik stands on the back foot and defends towards point
played with an open face to Johnson at short third man
Malik backs away towards leg and cuts to short third man where Johnson moves to his left and fields, Malik brings up his 50
Bracken bowls a slower ball on off stump, Misbah gets under it and smashes it high over the long-on boundary, that's a massive hit, it's measured at 111 meters, the biggest of the tournament
driven to long-off for a single
Malik backs away towards leg and pushes the ball to long-on for two more
pushed towards mid-on off the front foot
Misbah moves towards the off side and paddles the ball through square leg to level the scores
Symonds bowls a bouncer which takes Malik by surprise, the umpire calls it wide and Pakistan have won!
